title: Club dissapeard
body:
I am the owner of the 
club : Waffen 
tag : KKonk  
And i cant see my club although the other members can .. Thanks for your time.

replies.body: There shouldn't be further issues with club owners seeing their own club since the [outage](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look.  We'll reply back asap!
